Metadata.Title: CVE-2021-3618 affecting package vsftpd for versions less than 3.0.5-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2021-3618 affecting package vsftpd for versions less than 3.0.5-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package vsftpd is earlier than 3.0.5-1, affected by CVE-2021-3618
